GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.5 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
net: preserve skb_end_offset() in skb_unclone_keeptruesize()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 23629b673b780d967b88a850b1518cf0f0ffc6aa, it was introduced in version v5.15.5 by commit fa5f8606353fd09af052d609e7988ee26fc1f2d5. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:

This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 23629b673b780d967b88a850b1518cf0f0ffc6aa, it was introduced in version v5.15.5 by commit fa5f8606353fd09af052d609e7988ee26fc1f2d5. For more details please see the references link.
